Name: Lucent Bounds
About the game: Lucent Bounds is a short and challenging 3D platformer. Make your way through an alien ocean planet by jumping, dashing, slamming, gliding, and swinging about. Avoid hazards, collect treasures, and challenge yourself in speed runs. Precise controls Fun mechanics Challenging World
